text: Do Romeo and Juliet, Cook's Assistant, and Sheep Shearer to quickly obtain 7 Quest Points and get immediate sell access to the list of protected items on the Grand Exchange.
As a new player, you may claim free runes from the Magic combat tutor in Lumbridge every 30 minutes. Consume them and claim more as often as possible for free Magic experience.
Bones are one of the select few items that are exempt from the 24-hour trade restriction list. Sell bones you get from Chickens, Cows, etc on the Grand Exchange for 100+ GP!
